instructions: Open the Apps drawer (if it s not on your home screen). Open Messages . Tap the text bubble icon on the bottom of the screen. Enter in the name of the person you want to text. Select the Start button. Select the built-in GIF button (smiley) which is located within the text entry field by tapping it. For Android Nougat : Tap the Smiley button, then tap the GIF button. You ll get an option for stickers or GIFs to browse. Or, to find a specific GIF, tap the search button. Enter in the text you desire, then swipe to find a GIF. Tap the desired GIF. Tap the Send button (looks like a paper airplane or triangle). Your GIF is on its way!
